department: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT)
venue: Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT)
description: An innovation challenge and 24-hour hackathon, part of the Vizag Tri-Mobility Challenge 2K26, featuring contests in Electric Vehicles (EV), Drones, Hardware Innovation, Software Innovation, and general Student Innovation. Participants will compete for prizes worth ₹1,80,000.

contact_persons.name: Dr. R. S. R. KRISHNAM NAIDU

target_audience: Students, particularly those interested in Electrical and Electronics Engineering and interdisciplinary innovation.
additional_info: Organized by Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology (NSRIT) in association with IEEE, Morris Garages, National Board Accreditation, and Institution's Innovation Council (Ministry of IDIP initiative). The Department of Electrical & Electronics Engineering is accredited by NBA under Tier I. For more details, visit www.nsrit.edu.in. Follow @nsrit_eee_club on Instagram. A QR code is provided for registration.
